actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to provide that assistance payments made under certain housing laws shall not be taken into consideration in determining the eligibility of persons for supplemental security income benefits.

summary.text: Prohibits the consideration of assistance payments under specified housing laws as income or a resource for the purpose of determining the eligibility of a person for supplemental security income benefits under the Social Security Act.

titles.title: A bill to provide that assistance payments made under certain housing laws shall not be taken into consideration in determining the eligibility of persons for supplemental security income benefits.
